name: Initial Drift Arcade
description:
Drive at tremendous speed, drift on narrow mountain roads, earn money to buy new cars and upgrade current ones to become the fastest driver on the mountain passes.

Game features:
- race against the clock (4 medals to achieve in each track), compete with your opponent's ghost
- global highscore, competition with players from around the world
- low poly graphics
- 7 route themes located in 3 different worlds
- 2 type of driving physics to choose - suitable for both beginners and advanced players
- 2 different driving style of cars - drift for downhill and grip for hillclimb
- 27 upgradable cars, divided into 7 classes, diversifying the driving style and requiring the player to various levels of car control skills
- 21 routes in 168 variations
- easy to play, hard to master
- 7 steering options (gamepad and keyboard support)
- 3 type of camera to choose
- addictive gameplay
